title: TOTAL ANNIHILATION FULL + MODS.rar
description:
it cointains:

-total annihilation v3.9.0.1 that is compatible with ALL the older versions

-the core contingency and battle tactics expansions

-some mods

-the zeal map pack 1,2,3,4, and other additional maps

- and some 3rd party units with the unit patch

- also the 6 unoficial cavedog units


INSTRUCCTIONS FOR INSTALATION:

no instalation xd, just unrar and copy "cavedog" to disk C (recomended, but not needed)

and click the executable "totalA" not " total annihilation" in the second one you choose resolutions and some other stuff


2)

to use the mods follow it instruccions some of them will need that you remove the 3rd party units other wont like mayhem, zero and escalation, for them you just have to copy and paste the files in the "mods totala" to the main folder, the one in that you have the game.

to return to your normal total annihilation game from one of this moded versions you must copy the "OTA" files from the mods folder and paste them in the main directory(where you installed total annihilation"

any question just ask

REMEMBER if you like this game SEED, and go to TA universe
